message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this amazing product for $95. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to come down to $90 for the product.  This is a significant discount from my original price and a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $87.50. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $87.50 just doesn't quite work for me. How about we split the difference and go with $88.50? This way, we both get closer to what we want.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $88.50 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $86.25. Can you meet me there?
